QuestData.Title: Kota Blend
QuestData.Description: Kota Peak is famous for its kafa bushes - no other can survive at this elevation.$B$BGrummles make very good living selling Kafa'kota Blend, but it's dangerous now thanks to my cousin here. He's got the wildlife up there hooked on kafa with his scheming.$B$BKafa'kota is more scarce than ever with goots gobblin' it up and yetis hoarding it in their caves.$B$BI pay you good for any berries you bring down from Kota.$B$BHere, take a sample. Eat it. See for yourself the power of kafa.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 100 Kafa'kota Berries from Kota Peak. They can be found in bushes growing on the mountainside or piled up in the yeti caves.
QuestData.CompletionText: <This should be more than enough berries to satisfy Uncle Keenbean.>
QuestData.RewardText: <As you bundle the berries together, you hear a mighty roar echo across the mountain, followed by the squeal of a terrified grummle.>
